text.1: I'm a 20 year old computer engineer student at UDG.
text.2: In my journey as a developer I've worked with talented people because I enjoy learning and collaborating to create beautiful and innovating products

text.1: Through the years I've learned a lot in all sorts of technologies for web development and computer engineering.
text.2: This skills have helped me build applications to solve real life problems.

mim.name: Master Incident Manager

chatify.name: Chatify
chatify.description: A real time chat web application to chat with everyone around the world.
